FilterItemPortable.Name: Anual
FilterItemPortable.VirtualTableWhereClause: A.NUMERO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM MF_AGENDA WHERE DATASAIDA >= (@CAMPO(ANOINICIAL) - 1) AND DATARETORNO <= (@CAMPO(ANOFINAL)+365) )

FilterItemPortable.Name: Mensal
Semanal
FilterItemPortable.VirtualTableWhereClause: A.NUMERO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM MF_AGENDA WHERE A.DATAINICIAL >= @CAMPO(DATAINICIAL) AND A.DATARETORNO <= (@CAMPO(DATAINICIAL) +7))
